author: huska0707
content:
With over 8 years of experience in developing full stack and Web3 applications, I specialize in utilizing cutting-edge technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, Web3.js, Ether.js, Solana and GraphQL.  I have implemented UX/UI design, ensuring seamless user experiences, responsive interfaces, and optimal performance.
Also, I have conveyed good code quality to you with Tailwind CSS and TypeScript and have experience in building an intuitive and user-friendly project.
I am committed to crafting intuitive, scalable, and secure Web3 frontends that leverage the full potential of blockchain and decentralized protocols.

Some of the web3 projects that I have worked on include:

> `Decentralized Exchange (DEX): Enables users to trade cryptocurrencies directly with one another.`
> `DeFi Staking Platform: Allows users to stake tokens and earn rewards.`
> `Token Launchpad: Assists new projects in raising funds and distributing tokens.`
> `NFT Marketplace: A marketplace for minting, buying, selling, and auctioning NFTs.`
> `Yield Farming Dashboard: Tracks and manages yield farming activities.`
> `Cross-Chain Bridge: Transfers assets across different blockchain networks.`
> `DAO Governance Platform: Facilitates decentralized community governance.`

I am enthusiastic about collaborating on innovative projects and welcome any ideas or suggestions you may have. 
Let's discuss how we can work together to bring your vision to life. I am looking for a new opportunity.
